mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_label (id, user_id, label_id, label_name, create_by, create_time ) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{labelId}, #{labelName}, #{createdBy}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM label_type WHERE label_name = #{labelName} and label_type=0

SELECT 1 FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_org uo ON uo.pk_user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.id = uo.pk_dept_id where u.deleted_flag = 0 and d.path like (select CONCAT(path,'%') from department where id = #{id}) limit 1

select u.username , d.`path` from user u left join user_org uo on u.id = uo.pk_user_id left join department d on d.id = uo.pk_dept_id where uo.pk_org_id = #{orgId} and u.deleted_flag = 0 and user_type = 1 and d.`path` LIKE concat(#{path}, '%')
